full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SBYOR BA'I CHOS DRUG GI ZHAL SHES DANG BCAS PA'I MAN NGAG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR BGROD PA'I GSER GYI THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025B ZHES SBYOR CHOS ZHAL SHES DANG BCAS PA'I MANG NGAG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR BGROD PA'I GSER GYI THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB LA MKHYEN PA YANGS SHED RGYA CHEN GTONG PHOD LA SOGS PA'I YON TAN DU MAS BRGYAN PA SENG GE RI KHROD KYI GNAS BLA MA DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL DANG, TSES BLOS GTANG GI DBEN PAR NYAMS LEN LA GCIG TU GZHOL PA SGO RTZE RI KHROD PA BSAM GRUB RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN @026A *, ,PA YAB SRAS RNAMS DANG, MKHAN PO KHRI RIN PO CHE DANG, BDAG NYID CHEN PO AA KYA'I YONGS 'DZIN LA SOGS PA'I YONGS 'DZIN BZHI BCU LHAG TZAM GYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BRTEN CING, KHYAD PAR SHAR RTZE RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' DRIN LA BRTEN NAS, 'DIR ZAB GNAD KHYAD PAR CAN THOB PA DKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB RIN CHEN GYIS DBEN GNAS SENG GE'I RI KHROD DGE 'PHEL CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS BLA MA NYID KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI LA BRTEN NAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
